item.title: By: John Bengtson
item.dc:creator: John Bengtson
item.content:encoded: The Dome appears up the block in this scene from the early Hal Roach – Ernie (Sunshine Sammy) Morrison comedy Non-Skid Kid (1922). Â The frame was taken at the intersection of 3rd and Grand, and looks north up towards 2nd.Â
